cheaper and faster method of investing than direct stock plans and we want to give you to prove it Just go to wwwsharebuildercompromoenhtm open an account and make your initial investment After your LIKE TO GIVE YOU A BONUS TO PROVE OUR POINT If you are currently investing using a direct stock plan we will pay you if you open an account and start investing with ShareBuilder To take advantage of to help you get started But please note that this offer expires October If you currently have shares in a direct stock plan you can easily transfe r them to your ShareBuilder account It will be easier
